scripts.docker:build: docker build -t gds-portal -f ./devops/Dockerfile --build-arg NODE_ENV=prod --build-arg REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region ap-southeast-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 621711101331.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com; docker tag gds-portal:latest 621711101331.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/gds-portal:latest; docker push 621711101331.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/gds-portal:latest
scripts.release: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run ecs:update
